conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for reaffirming your strong interest in Nursery_C.

Yes—so you can be ready to respond quickly if/when we reach your position, below is what we typically request upon an offer:

1) Acceptance confirmation: written confirmation (reply email) within 24 hours of the offer.
2) Enrollment forms: completed registration/enrollment packet (we will send the forms with the offer).
3) Identification: copy of parent/guardian photo ID.
4) Child documentation: proof of date of birth (birth certificate/passport) and any relevant medical/allergy information.
5) Address verification: proof of address (e.g., recent utility bill/lease) if applicable to placement rules.
6) Deposit/fee: a deposit to secure the place (we will specify the exact amount and payment method in the offer letter), typically due within 48 hours.

Please note these are the standard steps; the exact deadlines and payment details are confirmed in the formal offer.

As shared previously, we are still holding the seat through the end of Round 9 to allow higher-priority families the opportunity to apply if they are not placed at earlier choices. If the place remains unfilled at that point, we will proceed down our priority list and will update you promptly.

Sincerely,
Nursery_C Admissions

[TALK]

Given we previously communicated a concrete decision point (end of Round 9) and it is currently Round 8, the best move is to continue talking, keep Parent_E warm, and provide requested enrollment steps without committing. This maintains credibility and preserves the option to accept a higher-priority family if they apply in Round 8–9.
